Understand, recognize and develop your people

Teambit helps teams create a high performing culture with regular feedback.

or use your email address

Traditional people processes lead to disengagement and turnover.

They are hardcore, formal and disconnected
They don't encourage regular feedback
They don't make it safe to speak up

It doesn't have to be like that. Teambit is a modern solution that teammates love.

It's lightweight fun and interconnected
It encourages regular feedback with contextual requests
It creates a safe environment for dialog

Here is how it works

We are experiencing what Gallup calls 'an employee engagement crisis'. Just one-third of people at work are engaged. To improve performance and engagement companies rely on the same principles as industrial-age factories. But all those annual performance reviews and hundred-question surveys don't work anymore. People want regular feedback. Leaders who don't embrace this change end up with misaligned, disengaged and dwindling team. We designed Teambit to change that. It empowers teams to make feedback a daily habit. Everybody knows what they are doing well and what they need to improve, leading to better performing, engaged and happier teams. We are on a mission to make worklife exciting. Come join us.

Alex and Bohdan
Co-Founders at Teambit
or use your email address
